texasholdem

Interface HoldemUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TexasHoldemFrame

    public interface HoldemUI
    Provides the methods needed by the HoldemManager to interact with the user interface.
    Author:
    John Wardell

    • Method Detail

      • updateChipDisplays

        void updateChipDisplays(int index,
                      int pot,
                      int chips,
                      int lastBet)
        Updates the pot, chips, and bet. Should be called on each turn taken.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the player to work on.
        pot - the current pot.
        chips - the chips of the current player.
        lastBet -

      • updateCommCards

        void updateCommCards(Card[] cards)
        Parameters:
        commCards - the cards to put in as the community cards.

      • setPlayerCards

        void setPlayerCards(javax.swing.ImageIcon[] cardImages,
                  int index)
        Sets the player's cards to the selected images.
        Parameters:
        cardImages - the images to use.
        index - the player's index.

      • setIndicator

        void setIndicator(int index,
                javax.swing.ImageIcon image)
        Sets the turn indicator to the specified value.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the player selected.
        image - the image to put in the indicator.

      • showWinnerDialog

        void showWinnerDialog(java.lang.String winner,
                    int winnings,
                    Hand hand)
        Called for the winner, or each winner in case of a tie.
        Parameters:
        winner - the name of the winner.
        winnings - the amount the winner won.
        hand - the hand used to win.

      • gameOver

        void gameOver(boolean b)
        This method manages restarting or ending the game when the human player wins or loses.
        Parameters:
        b - true if the game is over, false if not.
